SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE) VALUES( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL , ?, ?, SYSDATE )
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
